Lalaking nagtatanong tungkol sa relief goods, binugbog umano ng mga tanod tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735712 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735712/lalaking-nagtatanong-tungkol-sa-relief-goods-binugbog-umano-ng-mga-tanod/story/ Isang lalaki sa Caloocan na nagtatanong lang tungkol sa relief goods ang binugbog at kinulong daw ng barangay officials, ayon sa ulat ng 24 Oras News Alert nitong Lunes. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 11:31:48 +0800
Zarate calls for probe on POGO hubs, says they may be protected by 'corrupt' officials tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735709 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735709/zarate-calls-for-probe-on-pogo-hubs-says-they-may-be-protected-by-corrupt-officials/story/ Bayan Muna party-list Representative Carlos Zarate on Monday called for an immediate investigation into other Philippine Offshore Gaming Operator (POGO) hubs in the country as they seem to be protected by "corrupt" officials. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 11:07:57 +0800
Secret health facility exclusive for Chinese discovered in Parañaque tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735707 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735707/secret-health-facility-exclusive-for-chinese-discovered-in-paranaque/story/ The local government of Parañaque discovered an illegal health facility exclusive for Chinese nationals where unregistered medicines for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and sexually transmitted diseases were also found. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 11:03:45 +0800
BI to roll out COVID-19 testing for immigration frontliners exposed to coronavirus tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735706 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735706/bi-to-roll-out-covid-19-testing-for-immigration-frontliners-exposed-to-coronavirus/story/ The Bureau of Immigration will soon test its employees exposed to the novel coronavirus as another measure to combat the spread of the infectious disease. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 11:00:44 +0800

Mon, 27 Apr 2020 10:51:06 +0800
Senior citizen dies in Muntinlupa fire tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735704 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735704/senior-citizen-dies-in-muntinlupa-fire/story/ A senior citizen died following a fire incident in Muntinlupa City on Monday morning. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 10:44:18 +0800
Mass registration for nat'l ID system moved to October due to COVID-19 --PSA exec tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735702 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735702/mass-registration-for-nat-l-id-system-moved-to-october-due-to-covid-19-psa-exec/story/ The schedule of mass registration for the national identification (ID) system will be moved to October, according to an official of the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA) on Monday. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 10:32:57 +0800
Robredo on proposed POGO reopening: Open businesses with Filipino employees, owners first tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735701 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735701/robredo-on-proposed-pogo-reopening-open-businesses-with-filipino-employees-owners-first/story/ “That [pitch] is unfortunate. Bago pa nangyari itong sitwasyon, nagkaroon na ng several discussions on this. May katiwalian, malaki ang social cost. In the Senate hearing, it was revealed that it only contributes .04 percent to domestic economy. Bakit natin sila uunahin na buksan kesa sa mga negosyo na ang empleyado ay mga Pilipino?” Vice President Leni Robredo said in a television interview. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 10:25:08 +0800
Navotas to sue individuals who lied to get DSWD aid amid COVID-19 pandemic tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735700 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735700/navotas-to-sue-individuals-who-lied-to-get-dswd-aid-amid-covid-19-pandemic/story/ The Navotas City government will sue individuals who lied about their income status and availed of the P8,000 social amelioration aid from the government amid the COVID-19 pandemic, Mayor Toby Tiangco said Monday. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 10:19:17 +0800
Philippine Army concerned with how evidence was handled in Ragos shooting tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735699 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735699/philippine-army-concerned-with-how-evidence-was-handled-in-ragos-shooting/story/ "That's one of the concerns of our Judge Advocate that the ones who handled the evidence are those who are also in the shooting," Army spokesperson Colonel Ramon Zagala said. "That's one of the recommendations of the Judge Advocate for an impartial investigation, these things are important because we will be judged by the people from what we do and as members of the Philippine Army, our concern is to find out what really happened," he added. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 10:09:02 +0800
Around 80 tricycles impounded in Manila due to ECQ violation tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735698 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735698/around-80-tricycles-impounded-in-manila-due-to-ecq-violation/story/ Authorities on Monday morning impounded some 80 tricycles in Quiapo, Manila for operating despite the implementation of the enhanced community quarantine (ECQ), which bans public transportation. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 10:04:43 +0800

Mon, 27 Apr 2020 09:33:24 +0800
North Korea s Kim Jong Un alive and well --South Korea tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735694 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735694/north-korea-s-kim-jong-un-alive-and-well-south-korea/story/ North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is "alive and well", a top security adviser to the South's President Moon Jae-in said, downplaying rumors over Kim's health following his absence from a key anniversary. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 09:23:59 +0800
Año says punishment for ECQ violators shouldn t lead to maltreatment, human rights abuse tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735693 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735693/ano-says-punishment-for-ecq-violators-shouldn-t-lead-to-maltreatment-human-rights-abuse/story/ Interior and Local Government Secretary Eduardo Año on Monday discouraged the imposition of excessive punishment to the violators of the enhanced community quarantine which could lead to maltreatment and human rights abuse. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 09:12:13 +0800
